00039   class SessionData : public ReferenceCount {
00040   public:
00041     SessionData(struct sockaddr_in &_addr, uint32_t leaseInterval, uint64_t _id) : addr(_addr), m_lease_interval(leaseInterval), id(_id), expired(false) {
00042       boost::xtime_get(&expireTime, boost::TIME_UTC);
00043       expireTime.sec += leaseInterval;
00044       return;
00045     }
00046 
00047     void add_notification(Notification *notification) {
00048       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(mutex);
00049       if (expired) {
00050         notification->eventPtr->decrement_notification_count();
00051         delete notification;
00052       }
00053       else
00054         notifications.push_back(notification);
00055     }
00056 
00057     void purge_notifications(uint64_t eventId) {
00058       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(mutex);
00059       list<Notification *>::iterator iter = notifications.begin();
00060       while (iter != notifications.end()) {
00061         if ((*iter)->eventPtr->get_id() <= eventId) {
00062           (*iter)->eventPtr->decrement_notification_count();
00063           delete *iter;
00064           iter = notifications.erase(iter);
00065         }
00066         else
00067           iter++;
00068       }
00069     }
00070 
00071     bool renew_lease() {
00072       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(mutex);
00073       boost::xtime now;
00074       boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00075       if (xtime_cmp(expireTime, now) < 0) {
00076         expired = true;
00077         list<Notification *>::iterator iter = notifications.begin();
00078         while (iter != notifications.end()) {
00079           (*iter)->eventPtr->decrement_notification_count();
00080           delete *iter;
00081           iter = notifications.erase(iter);
00082         }
00083         return false;
00084       }
00085       memcpy(&expireTime, &now, sizeof(boost::xtime));
00086       expireTime.sec += m_lease_interval;
00087       return true;
00088     }
00089 
00090     bool is_expired(boost::xtime &now) {
00091       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(mutex);
00092       return (xtime_cmp(expireTime, now) < 0) ? true : false;
00093     }
00094 
00095     void expire() {
00096       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(mutex);
00097       if (expired)
00098         return;
00099       expired = true;
00100       list<Notification *>::iterator iter = notifications.begin();
00101       while (iter != notifications.end()) {
00102         (*iter)->eventPtr->decrement_notification_count();
00103         delete *iter;
00104         iter = notifications.erase(iter);
00105       }
00106     }
00107 
00108     void add_handle(uint64_t handle) {
00109       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(mutex);
00110       handles.insert(handle);
00111     }
00112 
00113     boost::mutex mutex;
00114     struct sockaddr_in addr;
00115     uint32_t m_lease_interval;
00116     uint64_t id;
00117     bool expired;
00118     boost::xtime expireTime;
00119     set<uint64_t> handles;
00120     list<Notification *> notifications;
00121   };
00122 
00123   typedef boost::intrusive_ptr<SessionData> SessionDataPtr;
00124 
00125   struct ltSessionData {
00126     bool operator()(const SessionDataPtr &sd1, const SessionDataPtr &sd2) const {
00127       return xtime_cmp(sd1->expireTime, sd2->expireTime) >= 0;
00128     }
00129   };
